title: Ugly Ass Steve, N-Bomb In Paris, Highest Paid Gamecock, Homie Hoppin' in Vegas and more.
itunes:title: Ugly Ass Steve, N-Bomb In Paris, Highest Paid Gamecock, Homie Hoppin' in Vegas and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Shirley starts it off with something huge. The Chief Love Officer sets the record straight with a homie hopper in Sin City. Kanye's latest change got people shaking their heads again! Big Dog has some words about the political infighting that is happening right now. Mr. Ready to Love has something to tell us about marriage. Steve gives us the bets that he would take. Junior fails at Name That Tune. Coach Dawn $taley make$ hi$tory! Uncle Steve talks about his ugliness. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains the "yay and nay" of voting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
